title: The Emigrant; The Big Night; The Poison pen letters
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television
abstract: The Emigrant--The Big night--Poison pen letters
description: Episode of Series "Hancock's half hour". Hancock was one of the most respected comedians in Great Britain and in these three classic episodes, he demonstrates his talent. Disgruntled with life at home, Tony hopes to emigrate to Australia to find his fortune in The Emigrant." Saturday night is a night for fun, but in "The Big Night the reality for Tony and Sid falls short of their expectations. Tony receives "Poison Pen Letters" and despite the help of Sid and the police, he finds the answer to the mystery outside his own front door.
related_objects: Series; S01124; Hancock's half hour; Active; 1956
